ovdesc.p: This tableis used to store the credit accounts linked with the fee types defined in payments hub. During the Fee processing, depending on the charges which are applied to the payment, a lookup will be performed to identify the associated credit account(P&L account). This credit account along with the other charge details will be used to post entries into the general ledger.

desc.p: User ID of the record creator
Specifies the fee type for which the credit account is defined in the application.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.

Indicates the currency code of the fee type for which a credit account is defined in the application. This provides the flexibility to define different credit accounts for fee types of different currency in the payments hub.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.

A - Active
H - History
F - Future
C - Not active future
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Possible values:
L - Live
U - Unapproved
R - Reversed
Specifies the date from which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.
